input.sentences: chang family visited organization this summer .
the first park they visited was location location .
next day they went to animal kingdom .
they stayed in the park till night to see parades .
they enjoyed their trip to location .
output.sentences: This summer the organization where I work visited a theme park.
The park we visited was in a foreign country.
The first day we went to Animal Kingdom and we stayed through the night.
Every day that week we stayed at the park till it closed.
We enjoyed the trip and thought the park was in a great location.
